title: Intermediate Java Developer (Ref IJD002)
description: Enviro365 It Solutions is a dynamic software development company specializing in innovative software solutions. We pride ourselves on pushing boundaries and delivering cutting-edge products that enhance user experiences and drive business growth. Our team is dynamic, collaborative, and passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex challenges. We are looking for a talented and self-motivated Intermediate Java Software Developer to join our dynamic team. As an Intermediate Java Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality software applications that meet customer needs. You will collaborate with other developers and engineers to design and deliver innovative solutions using Java technologies.
responsibilities: Design, develop, and test Java-based applications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code
Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality and compliance with design standards
Participate in software architecture, design discussions, and planning sessions
Stay updated with emerging technologies and apply them to the software development process
Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review
qualifications: Minimum 4 years' experience as a Java Developer
Strong knowledge of Java core concepts and design patterns
Experience with Spring Framework (Spring Boot, Spring MVC)
Proficient in database technologies (SQL, JDBC, ORM frameworks like Hibernate)
Familiarity with web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
Experience with version control systems (Git, SVN)
Good understanding of Agile development methodologies
Ability to work independently and in a team environment
